data.title: Cambodia joins $340-mn plan to clean up textile, construction firms - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodia and seven other governments recently launched a six-year $340-million project in Siem Reap to reduce the output of hazardous chemicals from the textile and construction industries.

data.title: A US Navy ship will make its first port call in 8 years in Cambodia, a close ally of China - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: A U.S. Navy warship will make a port call next week in Cambodia, China’s close ally in Southeast Asia, the first such visit in eight years, according to a Cambodian statement on Friday.

data.title: He thought he had escaped Beijing’s clutches only to vanish back into China - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: “They told me that they are going to hand me over to the police. I’m worried.”

data.title: Fishermen find six rare Mekong giant catfish - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Six critically endangered Mekong giant catfish — one of the largest and rarest freshwater fish in the world — have been caught and released in Cambodia. Scientists estimate only a few hundred fish remaining.
